column2: This privacy policy does not apply to information that you choose to publicly post to or display on a Site.
Please note that, as provided in our Terms of Service, you grant us a license to all publicly-posted content and it can be syndicated to third-party sites and content partners.
We compile logs of IP addresses of Site users for administrative and analytical purposes.

Fulfill your requests for products, services and information, including to send you electronic newsletters or complete a transaction that you have requested; Enable you to participate in features such as surveys, polls, sweepstakes and message boards;
Provide you with electronic newsletters, updates, information, special offers and promotional materials on behalf of our Sites and third parties, in accordance with applicable law;

Analyze the use of our Sites and information about visitors to our Sites to understand and improve those Sites and our content offerings, and, in accordance with our sharing policies as stated below, to produce anonymous or aggregated data and statistics that we may share with third parties;
Develop and produce advertising tailored to your interests, as further described herein; and
Prevent potential illegal conduct or to address actual or suspected violations of our terms of use.
